title: Verify user can log into Forms Tool from the Login page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Browser cache is cleared
AND The user has been given permissions to access BAM Forms Tool
AND The user opens the BAM Forms Tool login page


https://qa-tools.bam-forms.com/#/login
custom_steps:
WHEN The user inputs their username
AND The user inputs their password
AND The user clicks Login
custom_expected:
THEN The user is logged in
AND The Form List page displays on the tab that it set to default in the userâ€™s My Profile

title: Verify user can sign out of Forms Tool
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into BAM Forms Tool

https://qa-tools.bam-forms.com/#/login
custom_steps: WHEN The user clicks Sign Out in the left menu (towards bottom)
custom_expected:
THEN The User is logged out
AND The BAM Forms Tool login page displays

title: Verify user can login into Forms Tool using a deep link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Browser cache is cleared
AND The user tries to open a deep link

ex:  https://qa-tools.bam-forms.com/#/forms/list/watching?page=1&sortField=dateUpdated&sortDirection=desc
custom_steps:
WHEN User inputs their username
AND User inputs their password
AND User clicks Login
custom_expected:
THEN User is logged in
AND The deep link opens

title: Verify a form can be searched by Name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user is on the Form List page
custom_steps:
WHEN The user inputs a search term in the Search field
AND The user clicks the "Search All Forms" button

ex:  Automation Test - Do not touch
custom_expected: THEN Forms with names that include the search term will display

title: Verify that clicking the tabs changes what you are viewing
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user is on the Form List page
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the following tabs

Forms I've Edited
Forms To Approve
Forms I'm Watching
All Forms
custom_expected:
THEN the view below will switch to show respective information
AND if no information is relevant then a message will display (ex: You don't have any forms to review)
